articles.content:
A consultant oncologist with the Federal Medical Centre, Ebute Metta, Lagos, Dr Ajibike Odunuga, tells GODFREY GEORGE about the dangers of cervical cancer and its treatment
What is cervical cancer?… [+12547 chars]
